languages.text: {n}Устройство определенно пытается что-то сказать вам: буква за буквой, мешанина на экране выстраивается в несколько слов, вы пытаетесь прочитать их... и отшатываетесь, чувствуя, как проклятая фраза, словно взбешенный зверь, начинает метаться по вашему сознанию, сметая на своем пути все мысли и оставляя за собой след из первобытного ужаса.{/n}

{n}The machine is obviously trying to tell you something, one letter after another. The gobbledygook on the screen aligns into a few words. You try to read them... and reel back, feeling the cursed phrase ravage your mind like a rabid beast, wiping away all thought and leaving behind a trace of primordial horror.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Устройство определенно пытается что-то сказать вам: буква за буквой, мешанина на экране выстраивается в несколько слов, вы пытаетесь прочитать их... и отшатываетесь, чувствуя, как проклятая фраза, словно взбешенный зверь, начинает метаться по вашему сознанию, сметая на своем пути все мысли и оставляя за собой след из первобытного ужаса.{/n}

And reel back, feeling the cursed phrase ravage your mind like a rabid beast, wiping away all thought and leaving behind a trace of primordial horror.{/n}

{n}The machine is obviously trying to tell you something, one letter after another. The gobbledygook on the screen aligns into a few words. You try to read them... and reel back, feeling the cursed phrase ravage your mind like a rabid beast, wiping away all thought and leaving behind a trace of primordial horror.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一个又一个字母浮现在屏幕上。很显然，这台机器在试图向你传达些什么。你试着去阅读屏幕上的文字……随后便退了几步。你感觉这些遭到诅咒的文字仿佛一头凶暴的野兽一样。它疯狂地蹂躏着你的意识，抹消了你所有思想，留下了一丝原始的恐怖。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The machine is obviously trying to tell you something, one letter after another. The gobbledygook on the screen aligns into a few words. You try to read them... and reel back, feeling the cursed phrase ravage your mind like a rabid beast, wiping away all thought and leaving behind a trace of primordial horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一个又一个字母浮现在屏幕上。很显然，这台机器在试图向你传达些什么。你试着去阅读屏幕上的文字……随后便退了几步。你感觉这些遭到诅咒的文字仿佛一头凶暴的野兽一样。它疯狂地蹂躏着你的意识，抹消了你所有思想，留下了一丝原始的恐怖。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La máquina intenta comunicarse contigo letra a letra. El galimatías de la pantalla se alinea, formando unas pocas palabras. Intentas leerlas... y reculas de inmediato, sintiendo que la frase maldita asola tu mente como una bestia rabiosa, borrando todo pensamiento coherente y dejando solo un terror primigenio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The machine is obviously trying to tell you something, one letter after another. The gobbledygook on the screen aligns into a few words. You try to read them... and reel back, feeling the cursed phrase ravage your mind like a rabid beast, wiping away all thought and leaving behind a trace of primordial horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La máquina intenta comunicarse contigo letra a letra. El galimatías de la pantalla se alinea, formando unas pocas palabras. Intentas leerlas... y reculas de inmediato, sintiendo que la frase maldita asola tu mente como una bestia rabiosa, borrando todo pensamiento coherente y dejando solo un terror primigenio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}機械はどうやら一文字ずつこちらに何かを伝えようとしているようだ。画面上にあるよくわからない単語は何らかの言葉を紡いでいる。それを読もうとすると…その呪われた言葉が狂った獣のように心を蝕み、頭の中のものを何もかも消し去り、古の恐怖の爪痕を残すように感じて後ずさりした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The machine is obviously trying to tell you something, one letter after another. The gobbledygook on the screen aligns into a few words. You try to read them... and reel back, feeling the cursed phrase ravage your mind like a rabid beast, wiping away all thought and leaving behind a trace of primordial horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}機械はどうやら一文字ずつこちらに何かを伝えようとしているようだ。画面上にあるよくわからない単語は何らかの言葉を紡いでいる。それを読もうとすると…その呪われた言葉が狂った獣のように心を蝕み、頭の中のものを何もかも消し去り、古の恐怖の爪痕を残すように感じて後ずさりした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Maschine versucht offensichtlich, dir Buchstabe für Buchstabe etwas mitzuteilen. Das Durcheinander auf dem Bildschirm formt sich zu einigen Worten. Du versuchst, sie zu lesen ... und schreckst zurück, als die verfluchte Phrase deinen Geist heimsucht wie eine tollwütige Bestie, alle Gedanken auslöscht und nur eine Spur urzeitlichen Schreckens zurücklässt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The machine is obviously trying to tell you something, one letter after another. The gobbledygook on the screen aligns into a few words. You try to read them... and reel back, feeling the cursed phrase ravage your mind like a rabid beast, wiping away all thought and leaving behind a trace of primordial horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Maschine versucht offensichtlich, dir Buchstabe für Buchstabe etwas mitzuteilen. Das Durcheinander auf dem Bildschirm formt sich zu einigen Worten. Du versuchst, sie zu lesen ... und schreckst zurück, als die verfluchte Phrase deinen Geist heimsucht wie eine tollwütige Bestie, alle Gedanken auslöscht und nur eine Spur urzeitlichen Schreckens zurücklässt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La machine essaie manifestement de communiquer, lettre par lettre. À l'écran, le charabia se transforme pour former quelques mots. Vous tentez de les lire... et chancelez. Vous sentez la phrase maudite faire des ravages dans votre esprit telle une bête enragée et submerger toutes vos pensées pour ne plus vous laisser qu'avec une sensation tenace d'horreur primordiale.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The machine is obviously trying to tell you something, one letter after another. The gobbledygook on the screen aligns into a few words. You try to read them... and reel back, feeling the cursed phrase ravage your mind like a rabid beast, wiping away all thought and leaving behind a trace of primordial horror.{/n}

Vous sentez la phrase maudite faire des ravages dans votre esprit telle une bête enragée et submerger toutes vos pensées pour ne plus vous laisser qu'avec une sensation tenace d'horreur primordiale.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Harfler birbiri ardına belirirken makinenin bir şey anlatmaya çalıştığı belli oluyor. Kargacık burgacık yazılar birleşerek birkaç kelime oluşturuyor. Okumaya çalışırken beyninden vurulmuşa dönüyorsun. Lanetli kelimeler, kuduz bir hayvan misali zihnini tırmalıyor. Düşüncelerini yitiriyor, ilkel bir korkunun pençelerine düşüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The machine is obviously trying to tell you something, one letter after another. The gobbledygook on the screen aligns into a few words. You try to read them... and reel back, feeling the cursed phrase ravage your mind like a rabid beast, wiping away all thought and leaving behind a trace of primordial horror.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Harfler birbiri ardına belirirken makinenin bir şey anlatmaya çalıştığı aşikâr. Kargacık burgacık yazılar, birleşip birkaç kelime oluşturuyor. Okumaya çalışırken beyninden vurulmuşa dönüyorsun. Lanetli kelimeler kuduz bir canavar misali zihnini tırmalıyor. Düşüncelerini yitiriyor, ilkel bir korkunun pençelerine düşüyorsun.{/n}
